title: Mascarpone and ginger crème brûlée
description: For the best results, this recipe should be started the day before, to allow the ginger to infuse with the cream. However, if you are in a real hurry, then steep for an hour and add a pinch of ground ginger to boost the flavour. Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need four ramekins or shallow dishes.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, seeds only (or 2 tsp vanilla extract)
10cm/4in piece fresh root ginger, peeled, very finely grated
60g/2½oz soft light brown sugar, plus about 4–6 tbsp for the topping
